name: PLASMAGUN
Description: basic effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see. with phase glide: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can beused either before or after the basic effect.with charged shot: Deal 1 additional damage to your target.Notes: The two moves have no ammo cost. You don't have to be able to see your target when you play the card.For example, you can move 2 squares and shoot a target you now see. You cannot use 1 move before shooting and 1 move after
